title: Learning Analytics-Based Language Education Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Non-synchronous learning in a smartphone-based LMS environment, studying learning analytics theories and application cases for language job skill enhancement

learning_goals: Can explain the historical developmental stages of learning analytics divided into four eras
Can comparatively evaluate the differences between learning analytics and educational data mining from a theoretical perspective
Can critically analyze cases applying learning analytics theories to language learning design
Can identify at least three ethical issues that may arise when utilizing learning analytics and propose mitigation strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
